headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 25% off the GP1, Infernus Classic & more
content:
Through May 25th cut costs while cutting corners with 25% off any of the vehicles from Cunning Stunts: Special Vehicle Circuit:

• Hijak Ruston
• Progen GP1
• Pegassi Infernus Classic
• Grotti Turismo Classic
• Select vehicle modifications

Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
